articles.description: The Belgian striker, who has scored 25 times for the Serie A leaders in a prolific season, has been reportedly considered by the Premier League clubs as a cheaper option to the Norwegian striker.
articles.content:
Inter Milan 'have slapped a price tag of £102million' on star striker Romelu Lukaku amid rumoured interest from Chelsea and Manchester City ahead of the summer.
